pipe@rats.name: Pipe
pipe@rats.examine:
It smells horrible. There is going some liquid out of the pipe and rats 
seem to like it much. Every rat gets a small dose of it and more they get, 
then more they are stronger.

rattrap@rats.desc[1]: A rat trap with a spring is here.
rattrap@rats.name: Rattrap
rattrap@rats.desc[2]: A perfectly prepared rat trap is here.
rattrap@rats.desc[0]: You see a rat trap lacking a spring.

bench@rats.name: Bench
bench@rats.examine: Father seems to like chaos. There is a drawer in the table.

d_hallway12@rats.desc[1]: The toliet room door is closed.
d_hallway12@rats.name: D_Hallway12
d_hallway12@rats.desc[0]: The toliet room door is open.

drawer@rats.name: Drawer
drawer@rats.examine: You see that it is openable.
drawer@rats.desc[0]: A drawer has been opened here.

ring@rats.name: Ring
ring@rats.desc[0]: A valuable ring is laying here.

dust@rats.name: Dust
dust@rats.examine: Maybe if you blow it, it will reveal something.

d_toilet@rats.desc[1]: The toliet room door is closed.
d_toilet@rats.name: D_Toilet
d_toilet@rats.desc[0]: The toliet room door is open.

ratthrone@rats.name: Ratthrone
ratthrone@rats.desc[0]: The throne of the rat master is standing here.

wall@rats.name: Wall
wall@rats.desc[0]: The destroyed wall reveals you an exit to north.

chest@rats.desc[1]: An old chest is unlocked here.
chest@rats.name: Chest
chest@rats.desc[2]: An old chest is locked here.
chest@rats.desc[0]: An old chest is opened here.

wall2@rats.name: Wall2
wall2@rats.desc[0]: The destroyed wall reveals you an exit to south.

wardrobe@rats.desc[1]: There is a white, closed wardrobe here.
wardrobe@rats.name: Wardrobe
wardrobe@rats.examine: It is made of the whitest wood you have ever seen.
wardrobe@rats.desc[0]: There is a white, opened wardrobe here.

woodstore@rats.title: Wood store
woodstore@rats.description:
You are standing in the wood store. It is a very simple room with
just one purpose: to store dry wood to be used in the cutlet.

rat2@rats.title: Continuing Tunnel
rat2@rats.description:
You are standing in a stinking tunnel. The stench is really
horrible. There is nothing special here; everything is covered some type
of green mass. Eehh!

coldstore@rats.title: Food store
coldstore@rats.description:
You are standing in another food store, but it is much colder
here.  This room is supposed to store food which wouldn't be able to stay
edible in normal temperatures. It looks to be well prepared, but all
food was touched by the rats.

rat4@rats.title: Master's room
rat4@rats.description:
How disgusting. It is a room full of pieces of different foods.
There is a huge pipe dripping some green liquid on the food.

chbedroom@rats.title: Child's bedroom
chbedroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the child's bedroom. The floor is covered with 
a very soft carpet. There is also a large sofa made of leather; against 
the sofa is a cupboard filled with lot of porcelan. In the middle of the
room is a small &+Cbed&*, just for the child.

chimney@rats.title: On the chimney
chimney@rats.description:
Where did you bring this eagle? You are on a chimney! You can try
to climb down like a Santa Claus.

bedroom@rats.title: Bedroom
bedroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the bedroom. The whole room could also be named
the white room, because everything is made in white. There is a large
double bed, a mirror and a huge &+Cwardrobe&*.

guestroom@rats.title: Guest room
guestroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the guest room. It is very nicely decorated.
The ceiling follows the shape of the roof so the room looks a little bit
like a triangle. There is a sofa that can be changed into a comfortable bed, 
a table, and a bookcase.

laundry@rats.title: Laundry
laundry@rats.description:
You are standing in the laundry. It's a dark room, and maybe if
you were a child, you would fear yourself entering this room. There is
also a bath, but not such a one like in the bathroom--this one looks
rather old. You can see some pipes following the ceiling leading in to the
wall. Right next to the bath is a &+yhole&*, where an awful stench is
coming out.

saw@rats.title: Saw
saw@rats.description:
You are standing at a saw. This is used to prepare the wood for
the cutlet. You also can see a hole leading down and as you look through 
it, you see the wood store. It is not often used because of the baby.
There is a staircase leading up.

terrace@rats.title: Terrace room
terrace@rats.description:
You are standing in a room which was once a terrace, but someone 
found it not good to have a terrace, so walls were built and a new room was 
created. This room is supposedly a relaxing room for Mom, because there is
a sewing-machine and a lot of textile and style magazines. Maybe you 
shouldn't move anything, because people owning a room like this have mostly 
an organized chaos in their items.

rat3@rats.title: Another Tunnel
rat3@rats.description:
You are standing in a stinking tunnel. The stench is really
horrible. There is nothing special here; everything is covered some type
of green mass. Eehh!

rat1@rats.title: Tunnel
rat1@rats.description:
You are standing in a stinking tunnel. The stench is really
horrible. There is nothing special here; everything is covered some type
of green mass. Eehh!

foodstore@rats.title: Food store
foodstore@rats.description:
You are standing in the food store. You see many cases with food
inside, but most of it is half-eaten by rats. It looks quite disgusting.

coalstore@rats.title: Coal store
coalstore@rats.description:
You are standing in a dirty room. There are lumps of coal for the 
cutlet stored. You see some buckets, shovels, and, of course, lots of
coal.

stairsup@rats.title: Hallway
stairsup@rats.description:
You are standing in the hallway in first floor. All things in this 
room are made of wood. This room is full of sunshine because of the large
window above the staircase. Against the window stands an armchair. It
looks to be very comfortable for reading.

toilet@rats.title: Toilet
toilet@rats.description:
You are standing in the smallest room in the whole house. There
is just one thing here and that is the toilet. It is very clear.

hallway_3@rats.title: Hallway
hallway_3@rats.description:
You are standing in the hallway. This is more a room for storing
all possible things like old wood, boxes, bottles, and everything that
could be used again sometime.

hallway_1@rats.title: Hallway
hallway_1@rats.description:
You are standing in the hallway. All the walls are made of wood.
There is a large window to the west and there is a door next to it. You
also can have a look at yourself in the mirror hanging on the south wall.
You see some shoes laying around, though not many.  It looks like a small 
family is living here.

kitchen@rats.title: Kitchen
kitchen@rats.description:
You are standing in Mom's kingdom. Everything is boiling here.
Everything is smelling very good. There are many cases, drawers, and
also an oven. You don't think you should move around anything here.

stairsdown@rats.title: On the staircase
stairsdown@rats.description:
You are standing on a small landing in the middle of the
staircase.  The whole staircase is made of wood.

garden@rats.title: Small garden
garden@rats.description:
You are standing in a small garden. There are just some flowers
growing here. It will need much work to make it larger and more beautiful.

cutlet@rats.title: Cutlet
cutlet@rats.description:
You are standing in the cutlet. The large stove dominates the
room. You see many different pipes going out of the stove. It is rather
hot and dirty here.

credits@rats.title: Credits
credits@rats.description:
Thank you for visiting this room. I hope this quest was fun for you
and made you some nice moments. If you have any comments, please write me
an e-mail: etrimon@falcor.karlin.mff.cuni.cz. I have written more quests,
there avaible on request. That's all for now. See you in the next
adventure. &+CEtrimon&*

bathroom@rats.title: Bathroom
bathroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the bathroom. The floor is made of white
tiles and they continue also on walls to the height about as high as your
neck. A large bath dominates the room and must be very comfortable. There
is also a &+Csink&* with a mirror above it. Against the mirror is a second
mirror, so you can see yourself from both sides. Don't forget the table
which is used for storing towels, toothpastes, and toothbrushes.

roof@rats.title: Under the roof
roof@rats.description:
The chimney didn't lead you very far. You are standing on a
wooden floor after a few steps. It's a totally empty room, there is only
one old pirate style chest laying here.

workroom@rats.title: Father's workroom
workroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the father's kingdom now. It's a room filled 
with materials, hammers, nails, screwdrivers ... Your eyes catch a large
workbench that has a drawer in it. On the bench are pieces of wood that
have been made into a small square.

livroom@rats.title: Living room
livroom@rats.description:
You are standing in the living room.  It looks very relaxing.
There is a long sofa, two armchairs, and a wooden table in the middle with
four chairs around it. You also locate a &+Cbookcase&* next to the door. 
It seems that this room was really decorated with passion.

hallway_2@rats.title: Hallway
hallway_2@rats.description:
You are standing in the hallway. All the walls are made of wood.
There is nothing special about this room; it looks just like a crossway.

masterrat@rats.name: MasterRat
masterrat@rats.description: The master rat is licking the &+Ggreen&* liquid coming out of the pipe.

guardrat@rats.name: GuardRat
guardrat@rats.description: A guard rat is guarding here.

erat7@rats.name: ERat7
erat7@rats.description: A smoke rat is running here.

erat2@rats.name: ERat2
erat2@rats.description: A sink rat is running here.

guardrat3@rats.name: GuardRat3
guardrat3@rats.description: Ratty the guard rat is guarding here.

mrat@rats.name: MRat
mrat@rats.description: A fat rat is running here.

guardrat4@rats.name: GuardRat4
guardrat4@rats.description: An elite guardrat is guarding here.

erat6@rats.name: ERat6
erat6@rats.description: A bed rat is running here.

erat3@rats.name: ERat3
erat3@rats.description: A robe rat is running here.

erat1@rats.name: ERat1
erat1@rats.description: A book rat is running here.

mom@rats.name: Mom
mom@rats.description: Mom, holding her baby, is standing here. She says, 'Help us from the rats.'
